mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gacetadata g, gacetadatav_viena vv, gacetadata_viena gv WHERE vv.solicitud=#{solicitud} and gv.solicitud=g.solicitud and vv.categoria=gv.categoria and vv.division=gv.division and vv.seccion=gv.seccion
and g.F_Registro = DATE_FORMAT(#{fechaPub1},'%Y/%m/%d')
and g.F_Registro between DATE_FORMAT(#{fechaPub1},'%Y/%m/%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{fechaPub2},'%Y/%m/%d')
group by gv.solicitud,vv.solicitud order by vv.secuencia ,ID_PUBL_PCT desc,count(*) desc limit #{limit}
